TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodePackageActivationContext extends System.Object implements class System.Fabric.ICodePackageActivationContext, class System.Fabric.ICodePackageActivationContext2, class System.IDisposable

summary.para: Represents the activation which contains information about a running code package in a Service Fabric application.
The and methods can be used to get an instance of the activation context.
Gets the name of the application.
Gets the name of the application type.

value.para: The name of the application type.

Docs.summary: Raised when a new code package is added to the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when a new code package is added to the service manifest.
Raised when an existing code package is modified in the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when an existing code package is modified in the service manifest.

summary.para: Gets the name of the fabric activated code package.

value.para: The name of the fabric activated code package.

Docs.summary: Raised when the code package is removed from the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when a code package is removed from the service manifest.

summary.para: Gets the version of the fabric activated code package

value.para: The version of the fabric activated code package.

Docs.summary: Raised when a new configuration package is added to the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when a new configuration package is added to the service manifest.
Raised when a configuration package is modified in the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when a configuration package is modified in the service manifest.
Raised when a configuration package is removed from the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when a configuration package is removed from the service manifest.

summary.para: Gets the ID that represents the service package name qualified with Application package name.

Docs.summary: Raised when a data package is added to the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when a data package is added to the service manifest.
Raised when a data package is modified in the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when a data package is modified in the service manifest.
Raised when a data package is removed from the service manifest.
Raised during an application upgrade when a data package is removed from the service manifest.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportApplicationHealth(class System.Fabric.Health.HealthInformation healthInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: The that describes the health report information, such as source, property, and health state.
Docs.summary: Reports health for current application.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. The code package activation context uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. The client optimizes messages to Health Manager by batching reports per a configured duration (Default: 30 seconds). If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately by using .

exception.para: Returned when a null reference is passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
Caused by one of the following:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportApplicationHealth(class System.Fabric.Health.HealthInformation healthInfo, class System.Fabric.Health.HealthReportSendOptions sendOptions) cil managed

Docs.param: The that describes the health report information, such as source, property, and health state.

param.name: sendOptions
param.para: The that controls how the report is sent.

Docs.summary: Reports health for current application. Specifies options to control how the report is sent.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. The code package activation context uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. The client optimizes messages to Health Manager by batching reports per a configured duration (Default: 30 seconds). If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately.

exception.para: Returned when a null reference is passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
Caused by one of the following:

param.para: The that controls how the report is sent.

Docs.summary: Reports health for current deployed service package.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. The code package activation context uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. The client optimizes messages to Health Manager by batching reports per a configured duration (Default: 30 seconds). If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately.

summary.para: The address at which the service should start the communication listener.

value.para: The address at which the service should start the communication listener.

summary.para: The address which the service should publish as the listen address.

value.para: The address which the service should publish as the listen address.

summary.para: Gets the path to the Temp directory that the Application can use for temporary files.

value.para: The path to the Temp directory.

summary.para: Gets the path to the Work directory that the application can use to store data. For example: the state of the replicas.

value.para: The path to the Work directory.
